FAQ

What services does Ozrit provide?
We offer end-to-end solutions in custom software development, mobile & web app development, AI & ML integration, UI/UX design, digital marketing, and cloud consulting
How long has Ozrit been in business?
Founded in 2009, Ozrit brings over 16 years of experience and a team of 500+ professionals to every project.
Which technologies and frameworks does ozrit specialize in?
Our experts work with Laravel, Node.js, React, Flutter, Python (Django/Flask), TensorFlow/PyTorch, AWS, Azure, and popular CMS platforms like WordPress and Drupal.
What makes Ozrit different from other tech firms?
We combine deep technical expertise with a client-centric approach—ensuring scalable, future-ready solutions delivered on time and on budget.
